Item ID10306

A black helm (h1) is a helmet that can be obtained by completing easy Treasure Trails. It requires 10 Defence to equip and has the same defence bonuses as a black full helm.

As with all Treasure Trails and black armour, this cannot be made via the Smithing skill. Players might wield it because of its unique design.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+12+13+10-1+12
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The helmet's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

A '''black helm (h1)''' is a helmet that can be obtained by completing [[Clue scroll (easy)|easy]] [[Treasure Trails]]. It requires 10 [[Defence]] to equip and has the same defence bonuses as a [[black full helm]].

As with all Treasure Trails and [[black armour]], this cannot be made via the [[Smithing]] [[skill]]. Players might wield it because of its unique design.
